column2: there is nothing better in this world than that gigantic burger of a pizza and a beer.  I would've preferred to have been watching football
column3: but at that moment it didn't matter.  All that cheese and sausage and tomato and butter crust was freaking unbelievable!!  I've never eaten anything like that before in my LIFE!  Each bite of pizza was equivalent to like 17 bites of any other pizza.  Coming from L.A. we were like
column4: uhh 2 pieces each that's not enough
column8: we could only eat one slice each.  Though we also had the calamari
